data.name: My Girlfriend is a Musician Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Return to Europe and go on another epic music tour with the OST of this musical Visual Novel! Feel yourself walking through the streets of Paris or having a drink at a bar in Barcelona as you listen to this varied and eclectic album.
data.about_the_game: Return to Europe and go on another epic music tour with the OST of this musical Visual Novel! Feel yourself walking through the streets of Paris or having a drink at a bar in Barcelona as you listen to this varied and eclectic album.
